message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $14,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value we receive for our product. We understand its worth to you is $12,000, and we aim to provide you with a deal that is beneficial for both parties. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction with excellent customer service. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to potentially welcoming you as a valued customer.
